chromevis_description.message: Magnify and change the colour of any text selected. Use the mouse or the keyboard to move the selection around the page.

chromevis_format_text.message: Shortcuts should be in this format: [Modifier]+[Key]

chromevis_gallery_description.message:
This extension magnifies any text selected on a web page. The magnified text is displayed inside a separate lens and preserves the original page layout. You can change both the lens text colour and the lens background colour.

Two lens display options:

- the Anchored Lens, which is always at the top of the window

- the Floating Lens, which floats immediately above the text selected

You can select text on a web page using your mouse or with your keyboard. Activate the lens with the keyboard or by pressing the ChromeVis icon. Use the keyboard to move your selection around by paragraph, sentence, word or character.

For a keyboard shortcut listing and to specify your own keyboard shortcuts, please refer to the ChromeVis options page.

NOTE: This extension does not run on this page or any Chrome Extensions Gallery page.

chromevis_gallery_tos_url.message: By installing this extension, you agree to the Terms of Service at https://chrome.google.com/extensions/intl/en/gallery_tos.html
